content: Immobilize allows you to bind an enemy in place for a small duration, at which point you’re able to make use of the pause to unload with attacks until the effect breaks. Stronger enemies like this Yaoguai Chief will break out a lot sooner than regular foes, and certain bosses can even resist it entirely, so be wary!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bullguard.md', within the main section titled 'Bullguard', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Bullguard' and the sub-subsection 'Bullguard Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Immobilize allows you to bind an enemy in place for a small duration, at which point you’re able to make use of the pause to unload with attacks until the effect breaks. Stronger enemies like this Yaoguai Chief will break out a lot sooner than regular foes, and certain bosses can even resist it entirely, so be wary!
